description: Interact with Confluence Cloud to manage spaces, pages, and content.

connections.stdioFunction: config => ({command: 'node', args: ['path/to/build/index.js'], env: { CONFLUENCE_HOST: config.confluenceHost, CONFLUENCE_USERNAME: config.confluenceUsername, CONFLUENCE_API_TOKEN: config.confluenceApiToken }})

confluenceHost.description: The host domain for your Confluence instance.

confluenceApiToken.description: The API token for Confluence authentication.

confluenceUsername.description: The email used for Confluence authentication.
